title: Episode 39: Take the Stand
itunes:title: Episode 39: Take the Stand
description:
For as long as humans have lived together in community, there has been the need for crimes and disputes to be settled by some form of court. Many of those trials have been fair, while others have been unjust. Some, though, have been downright weird.

* * *

This episode of Lore was sponsored by:

Stamps: Print your own postage and shipping labels from your home or office. Start your 4-week trial today, and claim your $110 bonus offer, which includes postage and a digital scale. Just visit Stamps.com, click on the microphone in the top-right of the homepage, and type LORE.

Audible: Read on the go. Choose from over 180,000 amazing audio productions today, and begin your free 30-day trial membership with a free book of your choice by visiting Audible.com/Lore. If you need a book recommendation, check out my latest thriller, Grave Suspicion.

Foot Cardigan: Life is too short to wear boring socks. Get one new pair of fun, colorful socks delivered to your front door every month. Start your subscription today at FootCardigan.com/lore, and use coupon code LORE3 to save 10%.
